create constant integer MAX with MAX = 1e6 + 7
create long longs n , d , a , b

create long long ans with ans = ( n % d ) * b

lines.text: create long long r with r = ( n / d + 1 ) * d
lines.code: long long r = ( n / d + 1 ) * d ;

lines.text: set ans to minimum of ( ans and ( r - n ) * a )
lines.code: ans = min ( ans , ( r - n ) * a ) ;
